title: UIBEN Co-ordinator
abstractText:
The objectives of the UIBEN coordinator are:

  1. to run a workshop for UIBEN award holders to facilitate cross-fertilisation of ideas and to consider how under-represented areas within the scope of the networks can be further developed;
  2. to consult with the UIB sub-group of the ESRC strategic research board to help networks develop any under-represented areas and to ensure that they and the initiative as a whole reach their full potential;
  3. to synthesise the work of the networks in order to identify key emerging themes, develop opportunities for synergies, and examine potential for added value to the activities of the individual networks.

The first objective will be met by running a workshop for the PIs in November 2009. Any Co-investigators who wish to attend will be welcome. A second meeting is planned for August or September 2010 after the end of funding for most networks. The second objective will be met by consulting with the Chair of the UIB sub-group and, if possible, attending a meeting of the sub-group in early 2010.  The third objective will be accomplished by soliciting and collating information received from network PIs at the workshop and electronically after it.
